paper.title: Country risk, ownership concentration and debt ratio of gas transport projects: A statistical analysis
paper.abstract: This paper provides a regression analysis of the debt ratio of project-financed LNG infrastructures and gas pipeline projects, by using data relating to projects whose financial close occurred between June 2004 and March 2011. The projects located in risky countries tend to exhibit lower debt ratios, which is consistent with the basic view of risk-averse funds suppliers. However, surprisingly enough, the more concentrated the equity ownership, the lower the debt ratio. (C) 2012 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the organizing committee of 2nd Trondheim Gas Technology Conference.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要进行的是回归分析，研究项目融资的债务比率与国家和所有权集中度的关系，并未涉及衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理等特定金融领域。
